name: Xtreme Office Chair Racing
description:
Ever wanted to relive the experience of racing through hallways on your fancy rolling office chair without actually exerting physical effort? Look no further, because now you can do so with Xtreme Office Chair Racing! (The developers are not responsible for any distress, frustration, or possible death that this game may cause).

Credits:

  • Aidan Carraretto - 2D Sprite Artist/SFX
  • Matthew Clifton - Music
  • Kurtis St. Thomas - Programming/Racetrack Design
  • James DeLoach - Programming/3D Modeling 

Created during the Gaming Project @ VT Spring 2022 Game Jam
